Gulf Solutions Group (GSG) comprises of a variety of business entities, operating under a single commercial umbrella. It includes a variety of specialised solutions, designed to cater for versatile industries.
Registered in 1999 at Dubai Internet City, in the heart of the United Arab Emirates, the company gathers experienced personnel from the United States, United Kingdom, South Africa, Australasia and Asia creating a specialised group providing IT solutions to the Gulf and international markets.

At its formation, GSG envisioned becoming an organisation possessing the diverse qualities and experience necessary to cater for a market with complex needs and multi-cultural backgrounds.
